nodes.text: Kip was a planet in the Outer Rim's Chorlian sector and the homeworld of the Kip species. It was a source of ulikuo gemstones. It was a damp mud-ball riddled with caves. Zorba Desilijic Tiure was imprisoned on Kip in 22 BBY, shortly before the Clone Wars. After the Battle of Endor, in 5 ABY, Ysanne Isard arranged for pirates to take over Kip and free Zorba. Kip years were roughly equal to three standard years.
